body: Now I have tried to implement HTML in my Team page but it doesn't work can someone tell me why?
body_tagged: Now I have tried to implement HTML in my Team page but it doesn't work can someone tell me why?
title: HTML Help

replies.body: Mind sending in a screenshot of your HTML? I can possibly help, you most likely have an error in your code, or you aren't correctly using HTML that is accustomed to the forums.
replies.body_tagged: Mind sending in a screenshot of your HTML? I can possibly help, you most likely have an error in your code, or you aren't correctly using HTML that is accustomed to the forums.

replies.body: When you are doing html for the team you have to click the pen and then write the html. Copy the html and click on the Pen button. It should say "Edit HTML"
replies.body_tagged: When you are doing html for the team you have to click the pen and then write the html. Copy the html and click on the Pen button. It should say "Edit HTML"

replies.body:

I'm going to go ahead and lock it ^-^
